Where did the United States military transport plane carrying 104 illegal Indian migrants landed in India in February 2025?
options: Sri Guru Ramdas Ji International Airport, Amritsar, Punjab
Indira Gandhi International Airport, New Delhi
Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport, Ahmedabad, Gujarat
answer: Sri Guru Ramdas Ji International Airport, Amritsar, Punjab
